title: In-Game Freeze's
body: when i start a game its basically normal until everything just freeze the game is still going on but the graphic part just freeze, i can move my champ around freely but my teammates,minions,enemy champs all freeze in there stance and start gliding on the ground, please help i lost a lot of good games because of this, when this happens i just Alt+f4 and e log in it should fix it will it happens again and i have to repeat that step in order for it to work please help me..
